text: Sup you Beautiful Bastards!

The first thing I'm just going to get out of the way
To answer the people that have been spamming me:
Yes, I did see the article this morning from The Verge
that was dismissive and disrespectful to me.
But it's not like this article is shocking to me
I mean, I don't think it was really even shocking to most of you.
We've seen more and more over the past few months, the past few years
Mainstream sites, mainstream brands taking shots at YouTubers
that threaten the status quo.
And I get it, it's a scary time for places like The Verge
They're these giant companies that employ people in the UK
San Francisco, New York, all over the place
And with all of that infrastructure, with all of those people
Working together as a team, busting their ass
According to Alexa.com estimates,
The Verge received over 60 million views in the past 30 days
But we can even say that's a hundred million
The estimates around their international numbers seem a little bit, uh, sketchy?
Meanwhile, they see me, just some shmuck with an editor
In the past 30 days getting 37 million views
Their average time on site is supposed to be
Around 2 minutes, ours is 8 minutes plus
I mean that could make you feel like garbage if you're someone that looks more outward than inward
So we see this article written by The Verge where they classify me as just a tabloid.
Simply a gossip vlogger.
Writing, "the biggest differentiators of gossip channels are the hosts.
Philip DeFranco tries to position himself as an objective, buttoned-up talk show host
Even though his eponymous show is all about his take on the biggest names in Youtube drama."
At this point, my question to the writer of this piece,
Lizzie, is, uh, when you say that I'm talking about the
biggest names on Youtube, are you talking about
the videos where I talked about takedown pieces from The Verge and the Wall Street Journal
And other places trying to take down PewDiePie
My videos were a detailed- how places like The Verge
misrepresented PewDiePie. Places that went for bloody takedowns over facts and reality.
Or were you referencing when I talk about YouTube news
And changes to the website, which is the #2 website in the world
Or was it when I talked about YouTube and I exposed potential child abuse
that was happening and it became national news.
Also, Lizzie, I have to say, I love that you point out that people like myself
We don't have formal journalism training.
And that is 100% true.
But then, in the article you provide multiple examples of you seemingly not doing your homework on this story
Which is one of the reasons that more and more people are coming to people like myself
You write, "And while many vloggers seem to have no interest in covering the world outside YouTube,
DeFranco has recently started covering the Trump administration."
And to that I ask, Lizzie, what is your definition of the word "recently"?
I have talked about the Trump administration since it became a thing.
One of the reasons my show has doubled and tripled in viewership
is because we started talking about politics before the election.
People don't know where to turn and my break-downs of what's happening
with Trump or what's happening in politics, that has actually become some of my bread and butter.
Also, this is so lazy, you write:
"DeFranco sits, late-night-style, on a couch, as he comments—"
It's not what—
I mean, there is a couch, but do you think I have the longest ass in the world?
What do you—what?
And also, it kinda bothers me that you put me in the same category as
someone that has gotten child molestation accusations wrong.
But ultimately Lizzie, this thing that I have to say to you
And I hope you don't think I'm speaking to you this way because you're a woman
I'm speaking to you this way because I think you're a stupid person
who has a word-a-day calendar and somehow fell into a writing job
Please, please, please continue to write about YouTube and people like myself
Because all it does is further validate people jumping on my boat
When more and more people see poorly researched, bullshit, takedown pieces
It just reminds them that you are soon to be the past
And individuals like myself that pride themselves on separating fact from fiction
that care about the conversation
who care about having something real
We currently are and more will look at you in the rearview
But with that said, enjoy this temporary traffic
From people that have adblock on
and uh

to go after people like myself?
